accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Rita Addessa Collection of ACTWU Memorabilia #6333 MB. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 5619: ACWA Records 5744: ACTWU Newsclipping Files regarding J.P. Stevens Boycott 6343 MB: Leonard Greenwald Collection of ACTWU and UNITE Memorabilia 6142: Richard Rothstein Collection of ACWA-ACTWU Files 6200/002: UNITE HERE Legal Department ACTWU Files

controlaccess.corpname: Amalgamated Clothing and Textile Workers Union

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: White glass plate with blue lettering : Human Dignity-An Eternal Quest ; Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America 1914 ; Textile Workers Union of America 1939 ; United Shoe Workers of America 1937 ; United Hatters, Cap and Millinery Workers International Union 1901
